Calgary, AB

Northern Birds

51.047387,-114.0414464

Nov 27, 2017

Bird nerds notes

We started targeting winter species in November such as ptarmigan, falcons, and owls. Although we didn't get out as much as we'd like we had a few really cool sightings. Highwood pass was on our list of birding locations but we didn't have much luck and now the road is closed; we'll need to find another place for ptarmigan. No new species were sighted.
